document_data.name: Echorn
document_data.symbol: A proper [[hawk]] with wings close on an open field; orange, amber and duskwood-brown.
document_data.mainbody: The '''Echorn''' was an [[elven]] house of [[Myth Drannor]] that later migrated to [[Selu'Maraar]].{{cite book/Sea of Fallen Stars|153}}
